channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The OECD lifts U.S. growth outlook — but it’s still a bleak forecast
item.description: The Organization of Economic Cooperation and Development expects the U.S. economy to slow dramatically this year, though its new forecast is slightly ...

item.title: I’m retiring at 63 with $1.5 million saved. Is 70/30 equities/bonds too risky?
item.description: “My spouse and I have a combined $5,500 in monthly Social Security payments and a $2,900-a-month pension.”

item.title: ‘I changed my will to deter vultures’: I’m in my 60s and disabled. Do I impoverish myself to qualify for Medicaid?
item.description: “I pay my taxes and insurance, donate money and personal belongings.”

item.title: ‘I haven’t filed taxes in 20 years’: I’m 55 and about to get laid off. I’ve $1 million in crypto. Am I in big trouble?
item.description: “I have $800,000 split across two 401(k) plans and a $69,000 lump-sum pension.”
